slashCommands.name: whm-accounts
slashCommands.description: List all cPanel accounts on WHM server
slashCommands.step: Use the whm.list_accounts tool to retrieve all accounts

slashCommands.name: whm-create
slashCommands.step: Use the whm.create_account tool with username, domain, and password

slashCommands.name: whm-dns
slashCommands.description: Manage DNS records (list zones, add/update/delete records)
slashCommands.step: Use DNS tools: dns.list_zones, dns.get_zone, dns.add_record

slashCommands.name: whm-status
slashCommands.description: Check WHM server status and health

slashCommands.name: whm-logs
slashCommands.step: Use log.read_last_lines tool with appropriate log file path

customCommands.name: whm-health-check
customCommands.prompt: Execute a complete health check of the WHM server: check server status, load average, disk usage, and list any suspended accounts. Format the output in a clear, readable way.

customCommands.name: whm-onboard-client
customCommands.prompt: Help me onboard a new client to WHM: create cPanel account, set up DNS records (A and MX), and configure basic settings. Ask for domain, username, and email before proceeding.

customCommands.name: whm-troubleshoot-email
customCommands.prompt: Troubleshoot email delivery issues: check MX records, verify mail server status, and read recent Exim logs. Ask for the domain to troubleshoot.

instructions.pt-BR:
Configuração Continue.dev para Skills MCP WHM Pro

=== INSTALAÇÃO ===

1. Instale a extensão Continue no VS Code:
   - Abra VS Code
   - Pressione Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + X
   - Busque por 'Continue'
   - Clique em 'Install'

2. Configure o MCP Server:
   - Pressione Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + P
   - Digite 'Continue: Open config.json'
   - Cole este arquivo de configuração
   - Ajuste as variáveis:
     * WHM_API_URL: URL do seu servidor WHM
     * WHM_API_TOKEN: Token de autenticação WHM
     * apiKey: Sua chave da API Anthropic

3. Recarregue VS Code:
   - Pressione Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + P
   - Digite 'Reload Window'

=== USO ===

Comandos disponíveis (digite no chat Continue):

1. Slash Commands:
   /whm-accounts       - Listar contas cPanel
   /whm-create         - Criar nova conta
   /whm-dns            - Gerenciar DNS
   /whm-status         - Status do servidor
   /whm-logs           - Ler logs

2. Custom Commands:
   /whm-health-check       - Health check completo
   /whm-onboard-client     - Onboarding automatizado
   /whm-troubleshoot-email - Troubleshooting de email

3. Comandos naturais:
   - 'Listar todas as contas cPanel'
   - 'Criar conta para dominio exemplo.com'
   - 'Adicionar registro A para www.exemplo.com apontando para 192.0.2.1'
   - 'Qual o status do servidor WHM?'
   - 'Mostrar últimas 50 linhas do log do Apache'

=== TOOLS DISPONÍVEIS (23) ===

Account Management:
- whm.list_accounts, whm.create_account, whm.suspend_account
- whm.unsuspend_account, whm.delete_account, whm.modify_account

DNS Management:
- dns.list_zones, dns.get_zone, dns.add_record
- dns.delete_record, dns.update_record, dns.validate_zone

Monitoring:
- whm.server_status, whm.service_status, system.get_load

File Management:
- file.list, file.read, file.write, file.delete

Log Analysis:
- log.read_last_lines

System:
- util.run_command, util.restart_service

=== EXEMPLOS DE WORKFLOWS ===

1. Onboarding de cliente:
   'Criar conta para newclient.com, adicionar registros DNS (A e MX), e configurar email'

2. Troubleshooting:
   'Cliente relata que site não carrega - verificar DNS, status Apache, e logs de erro'

3. Manutenção:
   'Suspender conta badpayer por falta de pagamento, documentar razão'

4. Monitoramento:
   'Relatório de saúde: status servidor, carga, contas suspensas, espaço em disco'

=== SEGURANÇA ===

- Operações destrutivas requerem confirmationToken
- Logs sanitizados automaticamente (sem credenciais)
- Rate limiting em operações de massa
- Validação de path para prevenir directory traversal

=== SUPORTE ===

Documentação: https://github.com/DevSkillsIT/skills-mcp-whm-pro
Issues: https://github.com/DevSkillsIT/skills-mcp-whm-pro/issues
Email: contato@skills-it.com.br
instructions.en:
Continue.dev Configuration for Skills MCP WHM Pro

=== INSTALLATION ===

1. Install Continue extension in VS Code:
   - Open VS Code
   - Press Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + X
   - Search for 'Continue'
   - Click 'Install'

2. Configure MCP Server:
   - Press Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + P
   - Type 'Continue: Open config.json'
   - Paste this configuration file
   - Adjust variables:
     * WHM_API_URL: Your WHM server URL
     * WHM_API_TOKEN: WHM authentication token
     * apiKey: Your Anthropic API key

3. Reload VS Code:
   - Press Ctrl/Cmd + Shift + P
   - Type 'Reload Window'

=== USAGE ===

Available commands (type in Continue chat):

1. Slash Commands:
   /whm-accounts       - List cPanel accounts
   /whm-create         - Create new account
   /whm-dns            - Manage DNS
   /whm-status         - Server status
   /whm-logs           - Read logs

2. Custom Commands:
   /whm-health-check       - Complete health check
   /whm-onboard-client     - Automated onboarding
   /whm-troubleshoot-email - Email troubleshooting

3. Natural commands:
   - 'List all cPanel accounts'
   - 'Create account for domain example.com'
   - 'Add A record for www.example.com pointing to 192.0.2.1'
   - 'What is the WHM server status?'
   - 'Show last 50 lines of Apache log'

=== AVAILABLE TOOLS (23) ===

Account Management:
- whm.list_accounts, whm.create_account, whm.suspend_account
- whm.unsuspend_account, whm.delete_account, whm.modify_account

DNS Management:
- dns.list_zones, dns.get_zone, dns.add_record
- dns.delete_record, dns.update_record, dns.validate_zone

Monitoring:
- whm.server_status, whm.service_status, system.get_load

File Management:
- file.list, file.read, file.write, file.delete

Log Analysis:
- log.read_last_lines

System:
- util.run_command, util.restart_service

=== WORKFLOW EXAMPLES ===

1. Client onboarding:
   'Create account for newclient.com, add DNS records (A and MX), and configure email'

2. Troubleshooting:
   'Client reports site not loading - check DNS, Apache status, and error logs'

3. Maintenance:
   'Suspend account badpayer for non-payment, document reason'

4. Monitoring:
   'Health report: server status, load, suspended accounts, disk space'

=== SECURITY ===

- Destructive operations require confirmationToken
- Logs automatically sanitized (no credentials)
- Rate limiting on mass operations
- Path validation to prevent directory traversal

=== SUPPORT ===

Documentation: https://github.com/DevSkillsIT/skills-mcp-whm-pro
Issues: https://github.com/DevSkillsIT/skills-mcp-whm-pro/issues
Email: contato@skills-it.com.br
